mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM Rooms a, (SELECT TOP ${limit} row_number () OVER (ORDER BY Room_ID DESC) n, Room_ID AS 'RoomID' FROM Rooms) b WHERE a.Room_ID = b.RoomID AND b.n > ${offset} ORDER BY b.n ASC
